main event: An observer witnessed an extremely bright white light in the western sky moving at high speeds and exhibiting irregular flight patterns.
interesting points: The object traveled in a northerly direction, disappearing after 6 minutes of observation., The observer noted the light emitted no sound during its passage., The brightness of the object increased significantly as it hovered before darting across the sky., The sighting occurred near Aspenglen Campground in Rocky Mountain National Park., The observer described the object's movements as unlike those of any aircraft they had previously seen.
location: Rocky Mountain National Park, Colorado, USA
